name: Don't Notice Me
description: Don't Notice Me is a narrative adventure game where you navigate high school politics, deceive authority figures, pick locks, break into rooms and solve murder mysteries: Typical teenage activities!
minimum_requirements: 最低配備: 作業系統: Windows 7 記憶體: 2 GB 記憶體 DirectX: 版本：11 儲存空間: 2 GB 可用空間
recommended_requirements: 建議配備: DirectX: 版本：11
